title: Snatra Album = Breezy display face
content:
Hi Everybody!

Trying to ID the "nice 'n' easy face.

Many thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015033929im_/http:/typophile.com/files/niceneasy_4728.png)
author: malbright

comments.content: looks very much like [Filmotype MacBeth](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015033929/http:/marketplace.veer.com/fonts/FMT0000012?cid=aff%5B626009%5D&NonEncodedURL=http%3a%2f%2fmarketplace.veer.com%2ffonts%2fFMT0000012) but not exact.
Wow! Fast. Thanks defiantone. Sadly though I need an exact.

You might try looking through the FontDiner and FontBros font collections.  
 - Herb

Thanks, Herb! No luck so far. Anyone? Still hunting!

Go team.
if that's the original art, a similar likeness may be all you get.
Thanks again, folks. I love this place.
